body_html:
I am not sure I fully understand. What is the reason I am getting the error message with graph_replace as done here? Why would it be prohibited from modifying the gradients within a get_updates call?

yaroslav,
Where in my code would/should I use assign instead?
I had heard that possibly I would have create the entire model again to begin with, which would seek computationally excessive.

body:
I am not sure I fully understand. What is the reason I am getting the error message with graph_replace as done here? Why would it be prohibited from modifying the gradients within a get_updates call?

yaroslav,
Where in my code would/should I use assign instead?
I had heard that possibly I would have create the entire model again to begin with, which would seek computationally excessive.
